hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via ETH/BTC Breakout with Options Flow
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes with ETH/BTC ratio consolidating ±3% for 10+ days, a breakout above resistance with >2x average volume AND simultaneous surge in ETH call option volume (>3x puts) signals transition to BULL regime with 80% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETH/BTC ratio breakouts during neutral periods often lead broader crypto rallies as capital rotates from stablecoin/BTC into higher-beta assets. Options flow confirms sophisticated positioning, not just spot speculation. Combined signals indicate institutional accumulation completing.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC breaks above 20-day high on >2x average volume
ETH call option volume > 3x put volume (24h)
ETH futures open interest increases by ≥15%

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to BULL OR ETH/BTC gains 8% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH/BTC ratio falls back below 20-day moving average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 30% of such breakouts fail to produce BULL regime OR result in false breakout (ratio returns to range within 3 days).
